definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: These unicycles are used similarly to flatland bicycles.
sentences.chinese: 這些獨輪車作用類似一般自行車。

sentences.english: You are going to need a real wheelbarrow.
sentences.chinese: 你現在需要一個真正的獨輪車。

sentences.english: The juggler performed atop a unicycle.
sentences.chinese: 雜技演員騎在獨輪車上表演。

sentences.english: An inmate learns to ride a unicycle in the prison gym. Seriously.
sentences.chinese: 這個犯人認真的在學騎獨輪車在監獄的健身房。

sentences.english: A purist form of unicycle, without cranks.
sentences.chinese: 一種最純粹的形式獨輪車，無曲柄。

sentences.english: Once you are good at it, riding a unicycle is just as easy as riding a bike (also called a unicycle with training wheel or a cycle for the disabled by some unicyclists).
sentences.chinese: 一旦你學會了，騎獨輪車就象騎自行車一樣容易。

sentences.english: These unicycles also cannot go backwards.
sentences.chinese: 這些獨輪車也不能倒退。

sentences.english: The nonlinear characteristics in the unicycle robot dynamic system make the robot control much more difficult.
sentences.chinese: 爲了實現對於獨輪車機器人非線性系統的姿態控制。

sentences.english: A lady sees a pot-mender at work at his barrow in the street.
sentences.chinese: 女士看到在大街上補鍋匠在他的獨輪車上幹活。
